Other Information.Test Conditions: 1 M NaCl as draw solution, DI water as feed solution, ambient temperature
Other Information.Additional Info: The membrane demonstrates a water flux of 39.6 LMH under AL-DS mode.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Molecular sieving with functional group adsorption

Other Information.Test Conditions: 2000 ppm Cu(II) as feed solution, 1 M NaCl as draw solution, ambient temperature
Other Information.Additional Info: The rejection rate for copper(II) ions is 97.5% due to the presence of chelating groups and increased tortuosity in the PA layer.

Sieving Mechanism: Molecular sieving combined with functional group adsorption

Experimental Validation.Method: Forward osmosis performance test, atomic absorption spectroscopy (AAS)
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Water flux: 39.6 LMH (AL-DS mode), Cu(II) rejection: 97.5%

Other Information.Additional Info: The material exhibits enhanced hydrophilicity and antifouling properties due to zwitterion-functionalized cysteine groups.
